I get it working and everything but just want to know how to install the mods? Do I need MC Patcher? Can I have all the mods installed once I install them?

The mods are allready installed just launch minecraft from "minecraft launcher.exe" i doesnt matter if u put .minecraft in roaming folder, its portable u can execute minecraft from any folder :)

Dont install mc patcher or Optifne it will mess up your mods!! Unfourtunaly when u have minecraft with 30 mods or more this two modifications cause several problems like missing textures or icons not showing in NEI. So... DONT install mc patcher or Optifine if u want to play minecraft with several mods like my pack.
